title: Gavin Anesbury Logo- simple sans (custom e)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011053622im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/gavin_3484.jpg)
  
At least I’m guessing its a custom ’e’. Can anyone give me a start on this, thanks. Chad
 [‹ It isn't Trajan ...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011053622/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47204 "Go to previous forum topic") [Design Museum Shop typeface? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011053622/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47192 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ichad

comments.content:
FF DIN, probably the light weight, with customized g, e, and dotless i.

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff\_din\_light/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011053622/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_din_light/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff\_din\_light/")
